task:
PC1 primarily separates which two cell populations?

A) Oocytes vs Granulosa cells
B) Granulosa cells vs Theca/Stroma cells
C) Theca cells vs Stromal fibroblasts
D) Endothelial cells vs Smooth muscle

Return a JSON object with the field: answer (the letter of your choice)
notes: Top positive genes (Inhba, Inha, Cyp19a1) are granulosa markers. Top negative genes (Cyp11a1, Cyp17a1, Col1a2) are theca/stroma markers.
